templateDef.name: Device IMEI
templateDef.desc: The IMEI for your Telit module.

templateDef.name: Pre-shared key (hex)
templateDef.desc: The pre-shared key you created for your Telit module.

templateDef.name: LWM2M Service
templateDef.desc: Select a previously defined LWM2M service.

lwm2mObjDefs.name: Telit Application Data
lwm2mObjDefs.xmlDef:
<!--

 MIT License
Copyright (c) 2018 AT&T
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, 
including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. 
IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, 
DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
-->
<LWM2M xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://openmobilealliance.org/tech/profiles/LWM2M.xsd">
  <Object ObjectType="MODefinition">
    <Name>Telit Application Data</Name>
    <Description1>
      <![CDATA[
      This LWM2M Object the ability to send application data from the device to the server.
      ]]>
    </Description1>
    <ObjectID>33205</ObjectID>
    <ObjectURN>urn:oma:lwm2m:x:33205</ObjectURN>
    <LWM2MVersion/>
    <ObjectVersion/>
    <MultipleInstances>Multiple</MultipleInstances>
    <Mandatory>Optional</Mandatory>
    <Resources>
      <Item ID="0">
        <Name>Uplink Data</Name>
        <Operations>R</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Optional</Mandatory>
        <Type>Opaque</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration/>
        <Units/>
        <Description>
          <![CDATA[ Application Data Sent to Server ]]>
        </Description>
      </Item>
      <Item ID="1">
        <Name>Downlink Data</Name>
        <Operations>RW</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Optional</Mandatory>
        <Type>Opaque</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration/>
        <Units/>
        <Description>
          <![CDATA[ Application Data Received from Server ]]>
        </Description>
      </Item>
      <Item ID="2">
        <Name>Application ID</Name>
        <Operations>RW</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Optional</Mandatory>
        <Type>Integer</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration/>
        <Units/>
        <Description>
          <![CDATA[ Application ID identifies the data flow ]]>
        </Description>
      </Item>
    </Resources>
    <Description2/>
  </Object>
</LWM2M>

lwm2mObjDefs.name: Telit AT Command
lwm2mObjDefs.xmlDef:
<!--

 MIT License
Copyright (c) 2018 AT&T
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, 
including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. 
IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, 
DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
-->
<LWM2M xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://openmobilealliance.org/tech/profiles/LWM2M.xsd">
  <Object ObjectType="MODefinition">
    <Name>Telit AT Command</Name>
    <Description1>
      <![CDATA[
      This LWM2M Object provides the ability to execute AT commands on the module.  To use this object, write the AT command you wish to execute to the Command (1) resource, Execute the Run (4) resource, and then wait for the Status (2) resource to return "IDLE".  Once complete, you can read the response in the Response (1) resource.
      ]]>
    </Description1>
    <ObjectID>33206</ObjectID>
    <ObjectURN>urn:oma:lwm2m:x:33206</ObjectURN>
    <LWM2MVersion/>
    <ObjectVersion/>
    <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
    <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
    <Resources>
      <Item ID="0">
        <Name>Command</Name>
        <Operations>RW</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
        <Type>String</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration/>
        <Units/>
        <Description>
        </Description>
      </Item>
      <Item ID="1">
        <Name>Response</Name>
        <Operations>R</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Multiple</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
        <Type>String</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration/>
        <Units/>
        <Description>
        </Description>
      </Item>
      <Item ID="2">
        <Name>Status</Name>
        <Operations>R</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
        <Type>String</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration/>
        <Units/>
        <Description>
        </Description>
      </Item>
      <Item ID="3">
        <Name>Timeout</Name>
        <Operations>RW</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Optional</Mandatory>
        <Type>Integer</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration/>
        <Units/>
        <Description>
        </Description>
      </Item>
      <Item ID="4">
        <Name>Run</Name>
        <Operations>E</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
        <Type>None</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration/>
        <Units/>
        <Description>
        </Description>
      </Item>
    </Resources>
    <Description2/>
  </Object>
</LWM2M>

lwm2mObjDefs.name: Telit IDs
lwm2mObjDefs.xmlDef:
<!--

 MIT License
Copyright (c) 2018 AT&T
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, 
including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. 
IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, 
DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
-->
<LWM2M xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://openmobilealliance.org/tech/profiles/LWM2M.xsd">
  <Object ObjectType="MODefinition">
    <Name>Telit IDs</Name>
    <Description1>
      <![CDATA[
      This LWM2M Object provides alternative unique IDs for the Telit module.
      ]]>
    </Description1>
    <ObjectID>33207</ObjectID>
    <ObjectURN>urn:oma:lwm2m:x:33207</ObjectURN>
    <LWM2MVersion/>
    <ObjectVersion/>
    <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
    <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
    <Resources>
      <Item ID="0">
        <Name>Telit:IoT:ID</Name>
        <Operations>R</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
        <Type>String</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration/>
        <Units/>
        <Description>
        </Description>
      </Item>
      <Item ID="1">
        <Name>Secondary Telit ID</Name>
        <Operations>R</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
        <Type>String</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration/>
        <Units/>
        <Description>
        </Description>
      </Item>
      <Item ID="2">
        <Name>IMEI</Name>
        <Operations>R</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
        <Type>String</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration/>
        <Units/>
        <Description>
        </Description>
      </Item>
      <Item ID="3">
        <Name>Serial Number</Name>
        <Operations>R</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
        <Type>String</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration/>
        <Units/>
        <Description>
        </Description>
      </Item>
      <Item ID="4">
        <Name>IMSI</Name>
        <Operations>R</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
        <Type>String</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration>
        </RangeEnumeration>
        <Units/>
        <Description><![CDATA[The IMSI resource is used to log the IMSI used by the UE to identify itself to the network. The IMSI is defined in 3GPP TS 23.003 and is a combination of MCC (Mobile Country Code), MNC (Mobile Network Code), and MSIN (Mobile Subscriber Identification Number).]]></Description>
      </Item>
      <Item ID="5">
        <Name>ICCID</Name>
        <Operations>R</Operations>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
        <Type>String</Type>
        <RangeEnumeration>
        </RangeEnumeration>
        <Units/>
        <Description><![CDATA[The ICCID resource is used to identify the UICC used by the IoT device or module for authentication by the network. Reference ITU-T recommendation E.118]]></Description>
      </Item>
    </Resources>
    <Description2/>
  </Object>
</LWM2M>

lwm2mObjDefs.name: Cell Based Location
lwm2mObjDefs.xmlDef:
<!--

 MIT License
Copyright (c) 2018 AT&T
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, 
including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. 
IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, 
DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
-->
<LWM2M xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://openmobilealliance.org/tech/profiles/LWM2M.xsd">
    <Object ObjectType="MODefinition">
      <Name>Cell Based Location</Name>
      <Description1>
        <![CDATA[
        This LWM2M Object provides...
        ]]>
      </Description1>
      <ObjectID>33209</ObjectID>
      <ObjectURN>urn:oma:lwm2m:x:33209</ObjectURN>
      <LWM2MVersion/>
      <ObjectVersion/>
      <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
      <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
      <Resources>
        <Item ID="0">
          <Name>Config scan type</Name>
          <Operations>RW</Operations>
          <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
          <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
          <Type>Integer</Type>
          <RangeEnumeration/>
          <Units/>
          <Description>
          </Description>
        </Item>
        <Item ID="1">
          <Name>Start Scan</Name>
          <Operations>E</Operations>
          <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
          <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
          <Type>None</Type>
          <RangeEnumeration/>
          <Units/>
          <Description>
          </Description>
        </Item>
        <Item ID="2">
          <Name>Max Scan Time</Name>
          <Operations>RW</Operations>
          <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
          <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
          <Type>Integer</Type>
          <RangeEnumeration/>
          <Units/>
          <Description>
          </Description>
        </Item>
        <Item ID="3">
          <Name>Home Network Cell Results</Name>
          <Operations>R</Operations>
          <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
          <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
          <Type>String</Type>
          <RangeEnumeration/>
          <Units/>
          <Description>
          </Description>
        </Item>
        <Item ID="4">
          <Name>Neighbor Cells</Name>
          <Operations>R</Operations>
          <MultipleInstances>Multiple</MultipleInstances>
          <Mandatory>Optional</Mandatory>
          <Type>String</Type>
          <RangeEnumeration/>
          <Units/>
          <Description>
          </Description>
        </Item>
        <Item ID="5">
          <Name>Scan Status</Name>
          <Operations>R</Operations>
          <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
          <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
          <Type>Integer</Type>
          <RangeEnumeration/>
          <Units/>
          <Description>
          </Description>
        </Item>
        <Item ID="10">
          <Name>Latitude</Name>
          <Operations>RW</Operations>
          <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
          <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
          <Type>Float</Type>
          <RangeEnumeration/>
          <Units/>
          <Description>
          </Description>
        </Item>
        <Item ID="11">
          <Name>Longitude</Name>
          <Operations>RW</Operations>
          <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
          <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
          <Type>Float</Type>
          <RangeEnumeration/>
          <Units/>
          <Description>
          </Description>
        </Item>
        <Item ID="12">
          <Name>Accuracy</Name>
          <Operations>RW</Operations>
          <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
          <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
          <Type>Integer</Type>
          <RangeEnumeration/>
          <Units/>
          <Description>
          </Description>
        </Item>
        <Item ID="13">
          <Name>FixType</Name>
          <Operations>RW</Operations>
          <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
          <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
          <Type>Integer</Type>
          <RangeEnumeration/>
          <Units/>
          <Description>
          </Description>
        </Item>
        <Item ID="14">
          <Name>Timestamp</Name>
          <Operations>RW</Operations>
          <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
          <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
          <Type>Integer</Type>
          <RangeEnumeration/>
          <Units/>
          <Description>
          </Description>
        </Item>
        <Item ID="15">
          <Name>Validity</Name>
          <Operations>RW</Operations>
          <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
          <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
          <Type>Integer</Type>
          <RangeEnumeration/>
          <Units/>
          <Description>
          </Description>
        </Item>
      </Resources>
      <Description2/>
    </Object>
</LWM2M>

lwm2mObjDefs.name: Connection Agent
lwm2mObjDefs.xmlDef:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<!--
Copyright (c) 2020 Telit
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.
IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM,
DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
-->
<LWM2M xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://openmobilealliance.org/tech/profiles/LWM2M.xsd">
    <Object ObjectType="MODefinition">
        <Name>Connection Agent</Name>
        <Description1>Connection Agent</Description1>
        <ObjectID>33210</ObjectID>
        <ObjectURN>urn:oma:lwm2m:x:33210</ObjectURN>
        <LWM2MVersion>1.0</LWM2MVersion>
        <ObjectVersion>1.2</ObjectVersion>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Optional</Mandatory>
        <Resources>
            <Item ID="0">
                <Name>CID</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>1-6</RangeEnumeration>
                <Units></Units>
                <Description><![CDATA[CID]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="1">
                <Name>APN Name</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>String</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Units></Units>
                <Description><![CDATA[Access Point Name to be used by the Connection Agent. Applies at the next PDP activation]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="2">
                <Name>PDP type</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>0-2</RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[Select the PDP type]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="3">
                <Name>Log level</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>0-4</RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[The verbosity of debug messages output (on USIF1 interface). Applies immediately]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="4">
                <Name>URC level</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>0-2</RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[The verbosity of URC messages printed on AT interfaces when an event occurs. Applies immediately]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="5">
                <Name>Main timer</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>4-60</RangeEnumeration>
                <Units>sec</Units>
                <Description><![CDATA[Value of the main flow timer timeout. When it expires, the flow will execute. Applies immediately]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="6">
                <Name>Signal Level Timer</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Units>sec</Units>
                <Description><![CDATA[Must be bigger than Main Timer. Applies immediately]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="7">
                <Name>Net Registration Timer</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Units>sec</Units>
                <Description><![CDATA[Must be bigger than Signal Level Timer. Applies immediately]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="8">
                <Name>Data Service Timer</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Units>sec</Units>
                <Description><![CDATA[Must be bigger than Net Registration Timer. Applies immediately]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="9">
                <Name>Interval Timer Shutdown</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Units>sec</Units>
                <Description><![CDATA[Must be bigger than Data Service Timer. Applies immediately]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="10">
                <Name>RSSI Threshold </Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>1-31</RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[RSSI value in absolute unit (refer to AT+CSQ command). Applies immediately]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="11">
                <Name>RSRP Threshold </Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>0-97</RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[RSRP value in absolute unit (refer to AT+CESQ command). Applies immediately]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="12">
                <Name>BER Threshold</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>0-7</RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[BER value (refer to AT+CSQ command). Applies immediately]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="13">
                <Name>RSRQ Threshold</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>0-34</RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[RSRQ value (refer to AT+CESQ command). Applies immediately]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="14">
                <Name>X Pin</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[X Pin]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="15">
                <Name>Policy</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>0-1</RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[Applies on agent restart]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="16">
                <Name>PDP Retry Mechanism</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[PDP Retry Mechanism]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="17">
                <Name>Roaming Allowed</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>0-1</RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[Applies on next network control]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="18">
                <Name>Net Statistics</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>0-1</RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[Enable or disable the statistics collection. Applies immediately]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="19">
                <Name>Autostart</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>0-1</RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[Start Connection Agent at module startup.]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="20">
                <Name>Network IoT_technology</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>0-2</RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[Applies after a module reboot.]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="21">
                <Name>Agent Release</Name>
                <Operations>R</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>String</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[The Connection Agent library version]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="22">
                <Name>Username (APN)</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>String</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[APN username. Applies at the next PDP activation]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="23">
                <Name>Password (APN)</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>String</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[APN password. Applies at the next PDP activation]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="24">
                <Name>LWM2M Enable</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration>0-1</RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[Applies at the next Connection Agent start.]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="100">
                <Name>Agent Statistics Total Attempts</Name>
                <Operations>R</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[The number of total attempts done by the agent since last reboot]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="101">
                <Name>Agent Statistics RSSI Fail count </Name>
                <Operations>R</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[The number of Failed RSSI checks (signal lower than threshold) since last reboot]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="102">
                <Name>Agent Statistics Net Registration fail count </Name>
                <Operations>R</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[The number of Failed Network Registration checks since last reboot]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="103">
                <Name>Agent Statistics PDP Success count</Name>
                <Operations>R</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[The number of successful PDP activation attempts done by the agent since last reboot]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="104">
                <Name>Agent Statistics PDP Fail count</Name>
                <Operations>R</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[The number of failed PDP ]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="105">
                <Name>Agent Statistics Generic error count</Name>
                <Operations>R</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[The number of generic errors since last reboot]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="200">
                <Name>Agent restart</Name>
                <Operations>E</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type></Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Description><![CDATA[Forces the restart of the connection agent (for example to apply certain configuration parameters). WARNING: this could mean the LWM2M agent might stop and restart. Applies immediately]]></Description>
            </Item>
        </Resources>
        <Description2></Description2>
    </Object>
</LWM2M>

lwm2mObjDefs.name: Telit Services Management
lwm2mObjDefs.xmlDef:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<!--
Copyright (c) 2020 Telit
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.
IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM,
DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
-->
<LWM2M xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://openmobilealliance.org/tech/profiles/LWM2M.xsd">
    <Object ObjectType="MODefinition">
        <Name>Telit Services Management</Name>
        <Description1>This LWM2M Object provides the ability to enable or disable some services, and check their status.</Description1>
        <ObjectID>33211</ObjectID>
        <ObjectURN>urn:oma:lwm2m:x:33211</ObjectURN>
        <LWM2MVersion>1.0</LWM2MVersion>
        <ObjectVersion>1.1</ObjectVersion>
        <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
        <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
        <Resources>
            <Item ID="0">
                <Name>Service Enable</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Multiple</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Units></Units>
                <Description><![CDATA[Indicates the Telit available services list.]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="1">
                <Name>Service Status</Name>
                <Operations>R</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Multiple</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Units></Units>
                <Description><![CDATA[Indicates the Telit services status for each service in list.]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="2">
                <Name>External Observations Default Period</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Single</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>Integer</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Units></Units>
                <Description><![CDATA[The external resources observation polling cycle]]></Description>
            </Item>

            <Item ID="3">
                <Name>Critical Observations</Name>
                <Operations>RW</Operations>
                <MultipleInstances>Multiple</MultipleInstances>
                <Mandatory>Mandatory</Mandatory>
                <Type>String</Type>
                <RangeEnumeration></RangeEnumeration>
                <Units></Units>
                <Description><![CDATA[The critical resources list for observation]]></Description>
            </Item>
        </Resources>
        <Description2/>
    </Object>
</LWM2M>
